txt.en: With the defeat of Cloben, the dwarves of Thr칩r's Coomb will no longer have to quake in fear under the threat of the powerful gwiber.\n\nYou should bring Cloben's fang to Frithgeir in Zudrugund.

'This fang serves as a beacon of hope, friend. With Cloben's defeat, the dwarves have taken their first step towards the reclamation of their home. Your name will be revered among the Longbeards.\n\n'I fear that while this creature was powerful and deadly, it may not be the same beast that has pushed the brood of gwiber out from their mountain home, however....'
From the myriad beasts you have defeated in Thr칩r's Coomb, you have manage to obtain a great trophy: Cloben's Fang.
Frithgeir is at Zudrugund, which lies within N치r's Peak, north of the river.\n\nThe fang you recovered will long serve as a symbol of the defeat of the gwiber that menaced Thr칩r's Coomb.
